Paul Thornley as Ron Weasley. Picture courtesy: Twitter/@HPPlayLDN
Noma Dumezweni as Hermione Granger. Picture courtesy: Twitter/@HPPlayLDN
Cherrelle Skeete as Rose Granger Weasley. Picture courtesy: Twitter/@HPPlayLDN

story.storykicker: The fresh set of cast pictures from Harry Potter and the Cursed Child feature individual portraits of Ron, Hermione and their daughter Rose, and a family portrait.
story.storybody:
After sending Potterheads around the world into a whirlwind of nostalgia and excitement by releasing the first cast pictures from Harry Potter and the Cursed Child recently, the makers of the widely anticipated play have now revealed the grown-up versions of Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley and their daughter, Rose Granger Weasley! (Yes, Ron and Hermione's daughter is all grown up).

{mosimage}

While the first public preview of the 8th Harry Potter story is due on June 7, 2016, its makers are gradually uncovering details from the play, much to the delight of Harry Potter loyalists around the globe.

Also Read: The first pictures from Harry Potter and the Cursed Child are here

The fresh set of cast pictures from Harry Potter and the Cursed Child feature individual portraits of Ron, Hermione and their daughter Rose, and a family portrait.

{mosimage}

{mosimage}

While actors Paul Thornley and Noma Dumezweni will be playing Ron and Hermione, respectively, the character of their daughter will be played by actress Cherrelle Skeete.

{mosimage}

Also Read: Harry Potter's Privet Drive home is now open to visitors

And much like all of us, Skeete is also extremely excited about her Hogwarts stint--as is evident from her quote to BBC: "Putting on my uniform, ready to go to Hogwarts, and seeing everyone else in their uniform was exciting. I've been looking at it every day in the wardrobe department, waiting for the day I can get on the Hogwarts Express."

The complete cast pictures from the play will soon be released.
